title: Nidalee skin (bewitched) Broken
body: Was just in a game, and the Nidalee autos were non-existent and her Javelin Toss attack was a small light that came across the screen. Quite hard to dodge. The whole team had the same visual so it wasn't just me.

replies.body:
This is a known bug, and thus why all Nidalee skins are banned in the LCS.

They should have fixed it ages ago.
